Title: 2022 YouTube Streamy Awards
Description:
I hosted the Streamys this year! This year’s show featured a performance from Yung Gravy and was full of your favorite creators including Alan Chikin Chow, Alexa Rivera, Avani Gregg, Bob The Drag Queen, Brad Mondo, Brandon Rogers, Brent Rivera, CelinaSpookyBoo, Charli D’Amelio, CodeMiko, Colin & Samir, Cooking with Lynja, courtreezy, DankScole, Dhar Mann, Enola Bedard, Flashgitz, Happy Kelli, HasanAbi, Ha Sisters, Horchata Soto, Howieazy, Ian Boggs, Jaiden Animations, Jarvis Johnson, Jay Shetty, Jesser, Kai Cenat, Kallmekris, Leo Gonzalez, Marie Stella, Mark Rober, Mattie Westbrouck, Michelle Khare, MissDarcei, MrBeast, Pierson Wodzynski, Quackity, RDCWorld, Rhett & Link, Savanah Moss, SeanDoesMagic, Sheena Melwani & The Real Indian Dad, the cheeky boyos, The Game Theorists, Thee BlackBadger and xQc. #streamys #airrack

The “2022 YouTube Streamy Awards” is brought to you by Streamlabs. 

Follow me on Instagram!
INSTAGRAM ➡️ https://urlgeni.us/instagram/jBHg

2022 YOUTUBE STREAMYS AWARDS WINNERS AND HONOREES

OVERALL AWARDS
Creator of the Year: MrBeast
Show of the Year: Good Mythical Morning
Streamer of the Year: Kai Cenat
International: Khaby Lame (Italy)
Short Form: Sheena Melwani

INDIVIDUAL AWARDS
Breakout Creator: Ryan Trahan
Breakout Streamer: IShowSpeed
Collaboration: Mark Rober, Jim Browning, Trilogy Media • Pranks Destroy Scam Callers - GlitterBomb Payback 
Creator for Social Good: MrBeast and Mark Rober • Team Seas
Creator Product: POPFLEX • Blogilates 
Crossover: Gordon Ramsay
First Person: Airrack
Just Chatting: xQc
Variety Streamer: Ludwig
VTuber: CodeMiko

SHOW AWARDS
Podcast: Call Her Daddy
Scripted Series: In Space with Markiplier • Markiplier
Unscripted Series: Challenge Accepted • Michelle Khare

Animated: MeatCanyon

CRAFT AWARDS

BRAND AWARDS

Branded Video: Gorgeous, gorgeous people love Clé de Peau Beauté concealer! • Martha Stewart
